title: Interpretation of a dream about a married man getting married again

preview.html: Through this topic, we will learn together and in detail from the dream interpreter website gptafser.com/ We will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a husband getting married in a second. In addition to the interpretation of a married man’s dream about getting married again, the interpretation of a dream about my married brother getting married, all you have to do is follow the lines below with us. Interpretation of marriage In a dream for a single girl. Interpretation of a dream about marriage in a dream for a single girl. Evidence that the dreamer will obtain a lot of goodness and food in the coming season. Marriage is also good news that her life situation will change for the better, and God knows best. Marrying an old man in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that she is exposed to illness. If he sees an unmarried woman in his dream, as if he is not convinced of the idea of ​​marriage, then perhaps he is involved in a shameful relationship, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about marriage in a dream. Interpretation of seeing marriage again in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman getting married in a dream. Evidence that there is New responsibilities to be undertaken in the near future, such as work. Perhaps God will bless her with a long-awaited pregnancy, and God knows best. When a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is marrying another. He can increase his responsibilities and deal with them for some time. Marriage in a dream is the title of the priest’s transition and the birth of a son. Interpretation of seeing marriage again in a dream for a man and its meaningInterpretation of a dream of a married man getting married again in a dream. It is evidence of gaining power and money and the same amount of power as the beauty of a woman. Marrying a woman and not seeing her features in a dream is evidence of the approaching term, and God knows best. Marriage of a married man With a virgin girl in a dream and entering into marriage with her. A sign that the fortuneteller will be influenced by goodness and money in the coming period. Marrying a divorced woman and a widow is a sign that the fortuneteller will have a worldly relationship. When a man sees in a dream that his wife is marrying another man and he is the one who marries her himself, he may lose His money and power. If he is a merchant, he may lose his business. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about my ex-boyfriend marrying another girl. The meaning of seeing the wedding again in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. The interpretation of a dream about marriage in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence that the dreamer will have a wife. And whoever she saw in her dream She is preparing for the wedding and wearing a wedding dress, so the dream heralds her having a male child, and God knows best. A wedding in a pregnant woman’s dream without a celebration is a sign of kindness, happiness, and peace of mind for the fetus. As for the vision of the wedding and the singing and screaming accompanying it, it indicates fatigue and faltering births. Interpretation of the vision of marriage in A dream for young people and its meaning: Seeing a wedding in a young man’s dream indicates effort and hard work. The dream also symbolizes holding positions, the dreamer’s high position, and his status among people. Repeating the vision is nothing but the desires of the subconscious mind. Marrying a beautiful woman in a dream is a sign of the fulfillment of wishes and an increase in goodness. Marrying an old woman is a sign of loss and engaging in useless matters, and God knows best. You may be interested in: Interpretation of a dream about refusing to marry an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream about marriage in a divorced woman’s dream. Seeing a wedding in a divorced woman’s dream means

title: Interpretation of seeing a crab or lobster

preview.html: Interpretation of the crab or crab by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a crab or crab in a dream is a testament to the courage of the dreamer. As for seeing killing crabs, it is an indication that the dreamer is surrounded by many bad friends. A crab in a dream shows the strength of the dreamer. Dreaming of a crab in a dream can be a sign of getting rid of Enemies. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a crayfish for a single woman. See a single girl in a dream that he is eating a crab, this indicates wealth and many good things that he will obtain. In some visions, the abaya is a warning to an unmarried woman that there is a malicious person in her life and she must take care of him. It indicates A crab in a girl’s dream indicates the machinations and manipulations that she is exposed to by some people. A dream to see a crab for a married woman. A dream about a crab in a married woman’s dream is evidence of money that she will get without any effort. As for seeing a crab, it can indicate conspiracies and troubles that You fall into it. A crab in a married woman’s dream indicates a lot of sustenance and abundant wealth, if she is alive. Eating a crab in a dream means that you benefit from some money, but from something that was not taken into consideration. Seeing crabs for a pregnant woman Seeing a crab bite in A pregnant woman’s dream means benefit, money, and abundant living. Seeing a crab in the house indicates an easy and trouble-free birth. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a crab for a man: If you see a man in a dream who has been bitten by a crab, this means that you will hear good news. As for the dream in which a crab or crab occurred in a dream It is an indication of unpleasant events and bad friends in the life of the fortuneteller. The interpretation of seeing a blue crab is a sign of problems and troubles that a person faces in his life. Catching a crab in a dream shows patience, strength, and achieving goals and dreams. Seeing a crab killed indicates that the dreamer is a person who He is attracted to his desires and spends money on useless things. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing long hair in a dream for a single woman. Every girl loves to see her hair beautiful and healthy and shiny, so she takes great care of it and uses all methods and products to get it to a good stage that makes her feel satisfied with its appearance, but what she sees in it. A long dream. Is the vision a good omen? Or does its interpretation differ depending on the apparent details? Therefore, we will provide the different interpretations of seeing long hair, whether it is beautiful, smooth, or curly and looks exhausting, through our website as follows. Seeing long hair in a dream for a single woman. It has been known since ancient times that dreaming of long hair has many good connotations and beautiful meanings that make the dreamer feel better. A state of pleasure and joy, and long hair is a symbol of concealment, justice, and abstention from any shameful act. The longer her hair is healthy and beautiful and the woman feels happy because of her shiny appearance, this proves the happy events she is going through in the current period, and this is the reason for her happiness and her sense of contentment and peace. From her mind, as all problems and obstacles disappeared, and she moved away from them, her sorrows and worries became, and her life was full of calm and stability. As for curly or damaged hair, it is usually not referred to as a sign worthy of praise, but rather an indication of the harsh circumstances and painful events that she is going through, whether in her life Professional or emotional, through which unfair competitions occur at work. And she loses the position she wants, or it is represented by the emergence of major disputes and disagreements with her fiancé to the point of breaking off the engagement, which exposes her to bad psychological conditions. Seeing long hair in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin refers in most of his interpretations about seeing long hair for unmarried women to the good signs that indicate... There are many blessings and courage in her life, in addition to her enjoying a luxurious life with more money and possessions. Moving to another, better job or when she gets the expected job after her current job with more effort and effort and is therefore very close to achieving her dreams and aspirations. Long hair is interpreted with more good meanings, especially if it looks healthy and clean; Because it demonstrates good morals and sincere intentions in dealing with people, which makes him a beloved personality with an indisputable reputation. Academically or practically, the dream shows how difficult it is to achieve her goals and what she aspires to. If she sees that her hair is thick or falling out a lot, this indicates many obstacles and obstacles in her life, due to which she loses her ability to succeed and reach what she aspires to. It is always accompanied by challenges. The interpretation of seeing long curly hair in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing long curly hair varies according to its degree of complexity and the extent of the woman’s ability to comb her hair. In her love life, she marries a good, generous, kind-hearted young man, and God knows best. But if she sees that her hair does not look decent and is so complicated that it is not easy to comb it, unpleasant interpretations appear that indicate the extent of the problems and disagreements that dominate her life and...

title: Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s grave in a dream in detail

preview.html: Seeing the Prophet’s grave in a dream symbolizes the nearness of relief and a good ending, and the dream of visiting the Prophet’s grave indicates that you follow his Sunnah and approach. May God’s prayers and peace be upon him in a dream is one of the visions promising justice and improving conditions, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the Prophet’s grave in a dream by Ibn Sirin A dream means gaining honor and glory, and whoever sees the tomb of our Master Muhammad from the outside in a dream, this indicates that he will gain a good reputation among men, and hearing a voice from the grave of the Holy Messenger in a dream indicates guidance and a reminder of the afterlife and annihilation. Al-Nabulsi says: “Seeing the grave of the Messenger of God in a dream indicates A lot of goodness and justice.” The dream of going to the grave of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, is evidence of uprightness in religion, and whoever sees that he does not reach the grave of the Messenger of God in a dream, it is impossible for him to be steadfast. From his Sunnah, and kissing the grave of the Messenger in a dream indicates good remembrance and supplication. The dream of standing in front of the grave of our Master Muhammad indicates repentance for sin and abandonment of it. Whoever dreams that he is begging the grave of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, in a dream, he will achieve what he wants and his need will be met. It symbolizes coexistence with the righteous and pious. Seeing someone you know crying over the grave of the Messenger of God in a dream indicates relief from his distress and an improvement in his condition. And God knows best. The interpretation of seeing the Messenger’s grave in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq said: “Seeing the Messenger’s grave in a dream indicates justice in the Prophet’s religion and worldly affairs.” Whoever sees crowds of people at the grave of our Prophet Muhammad in a dream, this indicates the uprightness of the earth and the end of the calamity. The entry From the Gate of Fatima to the Tomb of the Messenger of God in a dream indicates facilitation of one of the religious or worldly matters, and whoever enters the Gate of Delegations to the Tomb of the Messenger of God in a dream will obtain a lot. Goodness and happiness for the one who sees mercy and forgiveness. Entering the Prophet’s room in a dream is evidence of righteousness of religion and adherence to the Sunnah, and whoever sees himself sitting in the Prophet’s room in a dream, this indicates guidance and kindness. Seeing the honorable kindergarten in a dream means a good destination, and whoever sees that he is praying in the honorable kindergarten. In a dream, it represents growth and blessing in blessings and an increase in glory, and the dream of praying in the honorable kindergarten indicates this. Fulfilling needs and achieving what is desirable, and God knows best. Interpretation of visiting the grave of the Prophet in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that visiting the grave of the Prophet in a dream indicates that you follow his Sunnah and approach. Whoever sees that he visits the grave of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, and reads the Qur’an in a dream, this means that he follows the truth, avoids falsehood, and sees Visiting the grave of the Prophet and praying with him in a dream. It means that the supplication is answered and what is requested. Visiting the grave of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace, with a known person in a dream indicates his participation in a good deed, and whoever sees himself visiting the grave of our Prophet Muhammad with an unknown person in a dream, this indicates guidance and repentance. Seeing a father visiting the grave of the Messenger God in a dream indicates success in work, and a dream of despair

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing fire in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream on the Mozakat website. I hope you like it and that you will continue to publish anything new on this excellent website. Seeing fire in a dream is one of the things that when seen causes panic and fear in people, whether in reality or in dreams, but fire has many benefits without it. We cannot cook food, sterilize medical instruments, or illuminate the dark. Therefore, fire has many connotations, and therefore we will mention it in the lines of today’s topics. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin went on to explain the dream of fire in a dream as a symbol of goodness and wealth. Whoever sees in his dream that his house has a fire that lights the house, this symbolizes that the dreamer will gain... Glory and abundant wealth. As for whoever sees a fire in another house in his dream, his dream indicates the loss of a dear friend, perhaps a close friend. As for whoever sees a fire in his dream and approaches it without fear, his dream symbolizes his courage. As for whoever sees a fire in his dream during the day His dream symbolizes war and strife in the family. As for whoever sees in his dream that fire has burned him, the dream indicates that he will suffer calamity and temptation from his guardian. Interpretation of dreams to see fire in a dream but it did not harm him, as his dream symbolizes large amounts of money. The money will be inherited by her. As for whoever sees in his dream the door of his house with fire and no smoke, his dream indicates his Hajj. As for whoever sees in his dream that there is a flame of fire in his house, his dream indicates marriage. Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. The great scholar Al-Nabulsi explained that the dreamer He saw his house burning as evidence that the dreamer was trying to change many things while in reality he was dissatisfied with himself. The interpretation of the dream of seeing fire burning in the oven is evidence that he will obtain a lot of money without putting in much effort. As for the dreamer’s perception that he is eating fire in the dream This indicates that he eats illicit money and eats the money of orphans. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a single woman: Seeing fire for an unmarried woman in a dream symbolizes her marriage. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that fire has burned her, then her dream symbolizes the approaching date of her marriage. Explanation of seeing fire in a person’s dream symbolizes marriage after a love story. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a married woman. Seeing fire for a married woman in a dream indicates her pregnancy. If a married woman sees a burning fire in her dream, then her dream indicates the outbreak of marital disputes between her and her partner. Awareness of fire that did not originate from fire in a married woman’s dream symbolizes abundance of sustenance. Interpretation of seeing fire in a dream for a pregnant woman. Awareness of fire in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the presence of a female child. As for fire in a pregnant woman’s dream as a result of a fire, the newborn was cleaner. In general, the interpretation of the vision Fire in a pregnant woman’s dream is desirable. As for the one who sees in his dream that the fire caught fire on him and his clothes and was able to extinguish it, his dream shows a quest for victory. Seeing a pregnant woman in a fire but unable to extinguish it in her dream indicates loss and suffering. As for the one who dreams of fire

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing illegal immigration in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing illegal immigration in a dream. Interpretation of seeing illegal immigration in a dream is evidence of many happy changes in the life of the fortuneteller. Also, seeing traveling by plane in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve many goals and desires. Dreaming of immigrating by sea and drowning is considered a sign that the dreamer will recover from His worries. We are also one of the desired visions that indicate the end of sorrows, the alleviation of worry, and the removal of anguish and pain. Seeing immigration via a dilapidated wooden boat at sea means difficult days. Interpretation of a dream about illegal immigration for a single woman. Seeing illegal immigration in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she In a wrong relationship and you should stay away from it. Also, seeing a girl running in a dream with her lover means escaping distress and getting rid of problems. Interpretation of a dream about illegal immigration for a single woman arising from her feeling of fear and anxiety these days. Seeing immigration in a dream for an unmarried girl is a dream that symbolizes To progress in science and work. Interpretation of a dream about illegal immigration for a married woman. title: Interpretation of dreams: I am sentenced to prison in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams that I am sentenced to prison in a dream, is one of the very disturbing dreams that a person would like to know about because it has important repercussions and that the dreamer claims that there are errors in his life that he must know to correct and anxiety surrounds him in every way, so we would like to harvest the removal site about This topic, so that you know the correct interpretation. Interpretation of dreams that I am sentenced to prison in a dream. Everyone who dreams of entering prison and looking through the window is almost a sign of relief and getting rid of the crises and suffering that he has experienced for a long time. If we dream of someone being imprisoned in a dream, this is an indication of He is facing a major crisis in his life, which he has been suffering from for a long time. When you see a man entering prison in a dream, this is an indication that he will be exposed to many problems and crises in his life during this period and the inherent failure and obstacle in achieving his desires. When one sees him entering prison in a dream, this is a sign of... Injustice and serious crises in his life. I dreamed that I was sentenced to death. Seeing a sick person in a dream does not mean saving him from illness and immediate recovery. Dreaming of a person in prison and the death penalty is a sign of the end of meaningless worries and problems for a long time. To see a debtor in a dream being executed, A sign of paying off debts and removing worries and sorrows. Execution in a dream, in general, is an indication of increased sustenance and abundance of money obtained by the dreamer. Dream Interpretation of Prison Sentence for Single WomenSeeing an imprisoned person in a dream for an unmarried person is a sign of imminent marriage for her, But it is a sign of her marriage to a wise and strong young man. Dreaming of an unmarried girl being imprisoned is a sign that the person is not well according to the circumstances of the vision. If you see a person imprisoned in a dream, and the imprisoned woman dies in his dream, this is a sign of her long life. Imprisonment in a dream Seeing a person in a dream with his breasts, with a ruling that he is fine, is a sign of the person recovering from illness. Seeing a person ruling against him, is a sign that the person is seriously ill. Seeing a person in court passing a ruling on him in a dream is a sign that the person’s fears And his problems will go away. For an unmarried woman, when she sees the issuance of a judicial order addressed to her, it is good news, and a release from her worries and sorrows. Read also, and at the end of the article, the interpretation of the dream in which I was sentenced to imprisonment in a dream. The interpretations are the jurisprudence of interpreters and scholars, but God knows best.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my sister smiling at me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my sister smiling at me in a dream. Every person searches for explanations for what he sees in his dreams. Therefore, we learn in the following lines about the interpretation of a dream about my sister smiling at me in a dream.. Interpretation of a dream about my sister smiling at me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister smiling at me in a dream. The sister’s happiness can indicate Happiness and joy, God willing. If the dreamer sees a happy sister in a dream, it could be a sign of goodness and blessings, and God is All-Knowing. If a married woman sees a happy sister in a dream, this may represent sharing and cooperation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a happy married sister in a dream, it may indicate That is about pregnancy and offspring, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about my sister breastfeeding my son in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my sister breastfeeding my son in a dream. Breastfeeding a child can indicate anxiety and sadness, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees that she is breastfeeding a child, she may express anxiety and sorrow, and God knows best. The unseen, while the interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child for an unmarried girl may indicate marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a child breastfeeding an unmarried girl in a dream may express his sustenance, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my sister who committed suicide in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister who kills herself in a dream can lead to a stronger relationship with her. God Almighty knows you both that seeing a sister killing herself in a dream may represent the sister’s need for help, and God knows all that is unseen. If the dreamer sees her sister killing herself in a dream, this may be evidence of the psychological crisis he is going through, and God knows best. When a married woman sees her sister killing herself in the In a dream, this may be a sign that she is going through a psychological crisis, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of my sister’s dream of cleaning my house in a dream could lead to goodness that she will get from the owner of the house, and God knows best. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees her sister cleaning Her house in a dream, this may indicate a project that she can participate in, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees someone cleaning his house in a dream, this may be evidence of a crisis he is going through, and a person is helping him solve it, and God knows the unseen. A pregnant woman’s miscarriage may lead to the woman giving birth before her due date, and God knows all that is unseen. If the dreamer sees his pregnant sister miscarriage, this may indicate premature birth, and God is Most High. If an unmarried girl sees a miscarriage in a dream, this may be evidence of a loss of anxiety and sadness. God willing. If a divorced woman sees a miscarriage in a dream, this may be evidence of marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my sister calling me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my sister praying for me in a dream. If a married woman sees in a dream a man praying for her, it may portend goodness that she will succeed, and God knows best. If a woman sees For a divorced woman in a dream, someone prays for her, as this may indicate the good that she will obtain, and God knows everything that no one has seen. title: I dreamed that my brother died because of Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my brother died. Death is one of the tragic events that a person can go through and causes a lot of sadness and pain in his life, because losing a loved one makes you feel that life has stopped and cannot move forward easily again. Because the brother represents the bond after the father in life, if you dream of his death, this leads you to feel panic and rush to search for the meaning of this dream and whether it is worthy of praise or not, God forbid otherwise. . Therefore, we will show you in detail in the following lines the most important interpretations that the interpreters received regarding the dream of the death of a brother. I dreamed that my brother died. There are many interpretations that interpreters have taken for the dream of the death of a brother, the most prominent of which are the following: If one sees that his brother has died in a dream, this is a sign of... His ability to confront his rivals and rivals and get rid of them. When a patient dreams of the death of his brother, this leads to recovery and healing. Seeing the death of a brother during sleep also indicates protection from an impending evil that could cause many material or moral losses to the dreamer. Some scholars believe that the death of a brother In a dream, it symbolizes gaining a lot of money that improves the dreamer’s life. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, a site about the secrets of dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. I dreamed that my brother died because of Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin mentioned - may God have mercy on him - There are several indications of seeing the death of a brother in a dream, the most important of which are: If a person dreams that his brother has died and he cries for him a lot, then this is a sign of the victory of enemies on earth. If a person suffering from illness sees in a dream that he is kissing his deceased brother, then this is a sign that he will be exposed to a serious physical illness. It is difficult to recover from it. If a person sees during his sleep his deceased brother and the goals of achieving it, such as a funeral and a shroud, then this leads to his piety and closeness to the Lord - the Almighty - and the establishment of many acts of worship and good deeds. I dreamed that my brother died. A girl who suffers from illness, if she sees in her dream that her brother is dying This is a sign of her short recovery, God willing, and the return of activity and vitality. An unmarried girl’s dream of the death of her estranged brother indicates the arrival of great benefit in her life and her vast strength, which makes her feel happy, satisfied, and at peace of mind. When a girl dreams of her brother’s death in an accident, this symbolizes her marriage to A person with high morals and praiseworthy characteristics. Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about the death of her brother and crying and intense sadness over him, expresses her attachment to someone in reality and the emergence of separation after that due to incompatibility between them. I dreamed that my brother died while he was alive. Interpreters provided praiseworthy evidence About dreaming of a brother dying while in reality he is still alive, all of this heralds the dreamer the coming of good and happy events in his life. Fulfills his hopes and aspirations. If a person is abroad and sees in his dream that his brother has died while he is alive, he will return to his homeland in peace. I dreamed that my brother died. One of the most important interpretations that scientists have reached regarding the dream of a deceased brother about a married woman is the following: When a woman dreams

title: Interpretation of seeing a killed scorpion in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a scorpion killed in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. In this article, we will learn together today about the interpretation of seeing a scorpion killed in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a scorpion sting in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that the scorpion has a sting, which is a sign of the human tongue, but the human being He sleeps a lot. As for Al-Nabulsi, he believes that the dreamer hitting a scorpion in a dream is evidence of gossip and sins, because the dreamer here has an enemy who angers and harms him, and the dreamer’s treachery and backbiting reach an extreme. The severity of the strike. If the sting is on the fortuneteller’s hand, it is a sign of envy that has seriously affected the foresight in his work or in a job that involves working with his hands. But if the sting is on the dreamer’s feet or legs, this indicates his harm and envy for his worldly life. But If a scorpion stings the fortuneteller’s chest, this is good news that his heart will be freed from hatred and malice. The sting on the face has no sign other than clear and obvious hostility to the viewer. But if the scorpion in the dream has a fatal sting, or the dreamer dies in his dream from the sting, then this indicates deception and deception. Which the dreamer weaves, and it may be a sign of magic, God forbid. As for whoever sees himself in a dream being stung by a scorpion, this is a sign that the person who had the vision is learning cunning, deception, and conspiracy. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a scorpion in a dream: A scorpion in a dream means the ultimate enemy and the arch enemy, and it could be a sign of witchcraft or the devil of dieting. As for seeing many small scorpions, it was a sign of many sorrows and worries. If the color of the scorpion was red, this indicates the turmoil to which the dreamer was exposed. The black scorpion indicates corruption and injustice. While the yellow scorpion is a sign of jealousy, envy, and hatred. The white scorpion is evidence that... The fortuneteller has fallen into his whims. If the Scorpio is transparent and colorless, this is evidence of the presence of a hypocritical man around the fortuneteller. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a scorpion stuck in a dream. The scorpion is one of the evil creatures that harm people, and the scorpion that fell into the hand of the dreamer shows its ability to defeat its enemy, but if If he chases a scorpion and throws it at people or people, this is an indication that the dreamer looks at people with envy, hatred, and theft. But if the fortuneteller throws a scorpion at his family or his wife, this indicates that the fortuneteller is doing what God has forbidden for his family. But if the fortuneteller catches scorpions, he is working on Exposing the deceivers around him, but if he catches scorpions and stings people with them, this indicates the corruption of the fortuneteller and that he walks among people, making them disappear and setting them on fire. The dispute between them. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a scorpion killed in a dream. If the dreamer dreams that he is putting a scorpion in the fire, this is a sign that he will get rid of a cunning enemy. And if the fortuneteller kills a scorpion, then the interpreters say that he will lose money, but it will return to it more and more. Ibn Sirin explains that killing a scorpion In a dream, it means that the fortuneteller’s money will go and be lost, but it will return again. As for Al-Nabulsi, he believes that killing the scorpion by the dreamer in a dream is a sign of victory over the enemies. We presented a number of previous interpretations and analyzes related to the fortuneteller’s money.
